title: Top Quality Infrastructure for Insolvency Proceedings
description: In 2024, Croatia achieved a score of 91.67 in the quality of institutional and operational infrastructure for judicial insolvency proceedings, indicating a strong framework for handling business insolvencies.

title: Fastest Customs Clearance for Exports
description: In 2023, Croatia had one of the fastest customs clearance times for exports, averaging just 1.1 days, which facilitates efficient international trade.

title: Highest Tuberculosis Case Detection Rate
description: In 2023, Croatia reported a tuberculosis case detection rate of 190%, indicating an exceptionally high rate of identifying TB cases.
